column3: Gold / Silver cards should be tier 0

column4: The "Alt path" card, the one different from the starting card of the same color

column14: You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit\nor a token adjacent to you up to 1 space.
You may move 1 space. Push an enemy unit\nor a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.
An enemy hero adjacent to you who\nhas played an attack card this turn\ndiscards a card, if able.
Move up to 2 spaces. Push an enemy unit\nor a token adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.
An enemy hero adjacent to you who\nhas played an attack card this turn\ndiscards a card, or is defeated.
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:\nMove into the space it occupied, if able.

This round: When any friendly minion in radius
is defeated you may discard a silver card.
If you do, the minion is not removed.
(The enemy hero still gains the coins for defeating the minion.)
This round: When any friendly minion in radius\nis defeated you may discard a silver card.\nIf you do, the minion is not removed.
A friendly hero in range gains 1 coin;\nif any hero was defeated this round,\nthat friendly hero gains 3 coins instead.
This round: when any friendly minion in radius\nis defeated you may discard a basic card.\nIf you do, the minion is not removed.
A friendly hero in range gains 2 coins;\nif any hero was defeated this round,\nthat friendly hero gains 4 coins instead.
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in\na straight line to a space adjacent to\an enemy unit, then target that unit.\n(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack.)
Before the attack: Move 2 or 3 spaces in\na straight line to a space adjacent to an\nenemy unit, then target that unit.

Choose one -
*Target a unit adjacent to you.
*You may discard a card;
if you do, target a unit in range.
Before the attack: Move 2, 3, or 4 spaces\n in a straight line to a space adjacent to an\nenemy unit, then target that unit.

Choose one -
*Target a unit adjacent to you.
*You may discard a card. If you have a card
in the discard, target a unit in range.

You may retrieve a discarded card.
This turn: You and friendly units in radius
cannot be moved, pushed, swapped
or placed by enemy heroes.

column2: During minion battle you count as a heavy\nminion; if you would be removed, lose the push instead.
